mapper.sql:
select su.id, su.username, su.nick_name, su.created_time, su.role_ids, su.role_names, su.dept_ids, su.dept_names, su.post_ids, su.post_names, su.tenant_ids, su.tenant_names from sys_user su where su.deleted = 0
and su.nick_name concat('%', #{nickName}, '%')
and su.username concat('%', #{username}, '%')
and json_contains(su.tenant_ids, #{tenantId})
group by su.id
mapper.select: select su.id, su.username, su.nick_name, su.created_time, su.role_names, su.dept_names, su.post_names, su.tenant_names from sys_user su where su.deleted = 0 and su.id = #{id} group by su.id
mapper.update:
update sys_user
username = #{username},
nick_name = #{nickName},
role_ids = #{roleIds, typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.handlers.Fastjson2TypeHandler},

role_codes = #{roleCodes, typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.handlers.Fastjson2TypeHandler},
